trans-unit.source: Provides data for input related events.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder data for inndata relaterte hendelser.

trans-unit.source: InputEventArgs is the base class for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] input event argument classes.
trans-unit.target: InputEventArgs er basisklasse for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] inndata argumentet klasser.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The input device to associate with this event.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte enheten å knytte til denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
Gets the input device that initiated this event.
trans-unit.target: Henter inndata enheten som startet denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The input device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte enheten knyttet til denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer hendelsesbehandling på en måte typespesifikke, noe som kan øke hendelsen system effektivitet.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen kaster generisk behandlingsprogrammet som <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventHandler>og aktiverer det.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer informasjon om denne implementeringen mønsteret og årsaker til den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>og [rutet hendelser oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: Generell behandlingsprogrammet å kalle på en typespesifikke måte.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
Gets the time when this event occurred.
